pages.title: Description
pages.text: The soldier of the Robo Tribe, the Robo-Warrior has been built and coded in a specific way to shoot mobs with their ray gun and chase those who run from them. Due to conflicting ties in their programming, Robo-Pounders will attack villagers and iron golems that are within their range.
